# MTLLibraryOptimizationLevel.size

**Case**

An optimization option for the Metal compiler that prioritizes minimizing the size of its output binaries, which may also reduce compile time.

## Declaration

```swift
case size
```

## Discussion

This option is similar to [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLLibraryOptimizationLevel/default], but adds optimizations that prioritize minimizing a shader’s executable size, which may also reduce compile time.

## Optimization options

- **MTLLibraryOptimizationLevel.default**: An optimization option for the Metal compiler that prioritizes runtime performance.
